* LMO - MiniMotors: The Ghost 
 * LMO - MiniMotors: The Hammerhead 
 * LMO - MiniMotors: The Hornet 
 * LMO - MiniMotors: The Patriot 
 * LMO - MiniMotors: The Fury 
 * LMO - MiniMotors: The Elite

 LMO (Locomotion) is a Portable item. 
 ※ Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. [#Legal]
